label: 女人禁制
本: The Historical Development of the Exclusion of Women from Sacred Places (Nyonin Kinzei) in Japan. ACTA ASIATICA, 97 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2009-08
説明文: the rule or custom of banning women from temples and other religious institutions or from sites associated with religious rites. The term nyonin kekkai" 女人結界 is used in roughly the same sense."
